alert.note: Alert for Ripley (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 04 at 9:04AM CST until March 06 at 9:37AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Current River near Doniphan affecting Ripley County. For the Current River...including Van Buren, Doniphan...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Current River near Doniphan. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CST Saturday the stage was 11.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 14.0 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
